interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK
Review Date: 2020/12/08
Store: HAMUULL
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'}
Review Text: These silicone face scrubbers are a little bigger than others I've used but it helps cover my area on my face when cleaning. The little nubs are longer and feel more pointed but these work at giving your skin a little extra scrubbing without injuring the skin. Easy to clean and should be easy to keep clean. Would also work at cleaning your makeup brushes.
Review Title: Good face scrubber
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Bloomy Essentials Top 3 Organic Essential Oils Starter Set 10 mL (1/3 oz) - USDA Certified Organic - 100% Pure Lavender, Lemon and Peppermint
Bloomy Essentials
{'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Lemon,Peppermint,Lavender', 'Special Feature': 'Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 3.6 x 1.2 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084567', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'}
I use essential oils for many purposes and this 3 piece set is a great starter kit for those who love lavender, lemon and peppermint. They smell great and are very versatile. Mix them with your favorite oil (I like coconut) and apply topically or add a few drops to a diffuser for a peaceful night sleep. I recently had a cold and mixed the peppermint and coconut oil and applied to my chest for a cough. It was soothing and helped with the sinuses as well. Makes a great gift because it comes in a cute little box as well.
Nice starter kit
Folora 4pcs Premium 1 Inch Wide Solid Color Floral Plaid Headband Set for Women Girls, Pink
Folora
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Brand': 'Folora', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.98 x 5.51 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FLR-HB-4pcs Pink'}
I ordered the pink headband set and these are really cute styles. The material is good and the band fits my small head well. If your head was on the larger side, they'd stretch but might feel tight behind the ears. They're durable and will keep my hair in place.
Small but cute
DROP THE BOMB Bbosong Sun Stick SPF50+ PA++++ 15g - Oil Free UVA/UVB Protection Sebum Control Skin Smooth Moisturizing Sunblock Stick Balm without Sticky, Primer before Makeup
DROP THE BOMB
{'Sun Protection': '50 SPF', 'Item Weight': '15 Grams', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'DROP THE BOMB', 'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 0.53 Ounces'}
I was not able to use this product as intended since it was in several pieces when it arrived. I liked that it was spf50 to protect the skin on my face but unfortunately, I can't use it.
Broken in pieces
Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'}
I need a good face scrub to clean out the pores but it needs to be gentle at the same time to not inflame my skin. This scrub didn't really irritate my skin but the granules in the scrub are very rough. I found it to be more so than other scrubs I've used. Thankfully, it didn't irritate my skin. I just had to be extra gentle. That said, my skin was smooth again so it does work.
Interesting texture
[the SAEM] Derma Plan Cleansing Bubble Pad 15pcs - One Step Gentle Makeup Cleansing Wipes Produce Fine & Dense Bubbles, Hypoallergenic Formula, Pore Clean, Mild Exfoliation
THESAEM
{'Brand': 'THESAEM', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 3.9 x 1.8 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Great if you're heading out for a trip. There's 15 pads in a little container so makes it easy to use. The pads clean well and are gentle to use. One step cleaning and easy to tote with you to the gym, plane or wherever you need a clean up.
Small travel pack
Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK
HAMUULL
{'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'}
These silicone face scrubbers are a little bigger than others I've used but it helps cover my area on my face when cleaning. The little nubs are longer and feel more pointed but these work at giving your skin a little extra scrubbing without injuring the skin. Easy to clean and should be easy to keep clean. Would also work at cleaning your makeup brushes.
Good face scrubber
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Focused on essential oils and their applications, with a strong appreciation for natural and organic products. The user is gradually deepening their interest in gentle yet effective skincare solutions, and is now exploring facial cleansing accessories.

- **Usage Patterns:** Engages in a holistic wellness approach through personal care and ambiance enhancement with oils. The recent acquisition of a skincare-related accessory shows an ongoing commitment to practical yet effective routines that care for the skin without irritation.

- **Types of Products Preferred:** Prefers starter sets in essential oils, fashionable accessories, and skincare items that ensure gentleness without compromising effectiveness. A focus on travel-friendly products underscores a practical perspective in their wellness journey.

- **Favorite Scents:** Enjoys fresh and soothing fragrances, notably lavender, lemon, and peppermint, aligning with a holistic ethos.

- **Application Methods:** Values safe mixing of oils with carriers for topical use and seeks stylish accessories that enhance their wellness lifestyle. Thoughtfulness in skincare routines takes precedence, with a preference for gentle formulations.

- **Social Aspect:** Prioritizes products that are aesthetically pleasing and easily shareable, often identifying gifts that merge wellness and fashion.

- **Overall Rating Behavior:** Generally delivers positive reviews but raises concerns regarding product integrity and effectiveness when expectations fall short, emphasizing the importance of quality and satisfaction in their wellness journey. The user effectively integrates portable solutions into their routine for convenience.
